title.value: ADHA My Health Record Emergency Contact Flag

description.value: The ADHA My Health Record Emergency Contact Flag code system defines values used to flag emergency contact relationship text in My Health Record.

copyright.value: Copyright Â© 2023 Australian Digital Health Agency - All rights reserved. This content is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License. See https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/.

definition.value: The element is relevant to MHR processing of patient emergency contacts.
